tag_list: indiana, wildlife, animals, rescue, sanctuary, nonprofit, bear, wolf, snake, monkey, ape, gorilla, lion, tiger, elephant
overview:
I’ve always been involved in Exotic animals, Rescue, Rehabilitation, Resocialization, Rehoming, Sanctuary work since 1987.

We got into Rescue, Rehoming,Sanctioning of Large species Exotic Parrots in 1988 and have been in high demand ever since.

In 2009 We received several calls and visits involving primates and monkeys etc.We then opened Us Primate Rescue & Sanctuary.

Our goal is to work with entertainers, Zoos, Research Facilities who retired animals, Pet trades,.

We also offer one of the largest databases of referral services nationwide for Exotics of any species type or size.
